short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lets users share web content with one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An application that allows you to send web links to your friends directly from the webpage. You can now share links without ever leaving the webpage. You share the link through a Facebook Message or a Chrome Notification.

*Facebook Login Required*
